document.full_text: muammar gaddafi's most prominent son, saif al-islam gaddafi, said in an interview broadcast on monday that it was "ridiculous" to imagine the libyan leader leaving and that allied air strikes were counter-productive.
document.title: talk of gaddafi leaving "ridiculous" says son
lines_and_colors: muammar gaddafi's most prominent son, saif al-islam gaddafi, said in an interview broadcast on monday that it was "ridiculous" to imagine the libyan leader leaving and that allied air strikes were counter-productive.
